subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] get your news in QS!
msgSnippet: I d like to second the request below. Both PDF readers I use (Adobe and Foxit) can scale and print pages on my printer, but neither can remove a margin that s
messageBody:
I'd like to second the request below. Both PDF
readers I use (Adobe and Foxit) can scale and print
pages on my printer, but neither can remove a margin
that's already there.
And I can't cut & paste the font, it's apparently a
series of images.

--- oliver langan <oliver@...> wrote:
> Is there any way to make the page margins and column
> width a bit
> smaller, so that the default size/zoom is a bit
> better on my personal
> toy of choice? :)


===========
Never insult anyone by accident.
- Robert A. Heinlein
